getVoltageMilliVolt

public int getVoltageMilliVolt()
The NXT uses 6 batteries of 1500 mV each.

Returns:
Battery voltage in mV. ~9000 = full.

getVoltage

public float getVoltage()
The NXT uses 6 batteries of 1.5 V each.

Returns:
Battery voltage in Volt. ~9V = full.
